intro: Immerse yourself in the third dimension in classic games with Virtual Boy™ – Nintendo Classics
description:
With a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership*, Nintendo Switch™ 2 and Nintendo Switch™ players can now access a collection of Virtual Boy™ games to play anytime, anywhere! Create suspend points in each game to save your progress, rewind to fix your mistakes, and adjust the controls to suit your preferences as you bash robots in Teleroboxer™, jump between background and foreground in Virtual Boy™ Wario Land™, and more.

The Virtual Boy for Nintendo Switch 2/Nintendo Switch accessory* or the Virtual Boy (Cardboard Model) for Nintendo Switch 2/Nintendo Switch accessory is required to play Virtual Boy – Nintendo Classics. 

Here’s the full list of what’s currently available at launch.
Teleroboxer™
Galactic Pinball™
RED ALARM
GOLF
Virtual Boy™ Wario Land™
3-D TETRIS®
The Mansion of Innsmouth

More games will be released in the future!
